answers.author: Ali Miller Richards
answers.text:
Hi Drew - I've sent you some stats via e-mail; any members with questions about membership demographics may request this information at membership@icma.org. 
You may also be interested in aggregate results from the ICMA State of the Profession survey which goes to all CAOs in U.S. jurisdictions with populations 2,500 and above (of which members are a subset). Age along with other demographics are typically included towards the end of the survey. ICMA conducts the State of the Profession survey every few years and aggregate results going back to 1998 are posted to ICMA's website here: http://icma.org/en/results/home/surveying/survey_research/survey_results.

author: Drew Cummings
text:
Hi all,
This is actually a question feeding into discussions of the ICMA Task Force on Women.  Does ICMA (or anyone else out there) have historical data on the average age of ICMA managers?
Thanks,
Drew Cummings
Asst. County Manager
Durham, NC
title: Avg. age of ICMA managers over time
